entry.title: Saturday: Chance of light snow. High 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow early this morning. Clearing near noon. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this afternoon. High 7. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Saturday 15 April 2023
